entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

Humidity: 98 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 8:25 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:25 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:25 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
